abstract.shortdesc: The prolog contains information about the topic, for example, author information or subject category. This information might be entered by an autor or maintained by an application.
The prolog element contains information about the topic as an whole (for example, author information or subject category) that is either entered by the author or maintained by a software application.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Typically, the metadata defined within the prolog is displayed with the topic when the topic is rendered, but it might be used by processes that generate search indexes or customize navigation.
